Process

Creating TPE (Thermoplastic Elastomer) pellets from used tires and industrial plastic crumbs involves several steps. Keep in mind that the process may vary depending on the specific equipment and conditions used

01

Manufacturing Process

Gather used tires and industrial plastic crumbs. Ensure that the materials are sorted to remove any contaminants like metal or other non-plastic materials.

01

Manufacturing Process

Gather used tires and industrial plastic crumbs. Ensure that the materials are sorted to remove any contaminants like metal or other non-plastic materials.
